snippet: A man from Pennsylvania's Amish country is headed to trial in a drive-by shooting that killed a horse pulling a buggy with a family inside....

headline.print_headline: Man to Stand Trial in Amish Buggy Horse Shooting
headline.main: Man to Stand Trial in Amish Buggy Horse Shooting

lead_paragraph: A man from Pennsylvania's Amish country is headed to trial in a drive-by shooting that killed a horse pulling a buggy with a family inside.
